title: Best of The Program | Guests: Jim DeMint and April Pollock & Shelly Heller | 7/8/20
description:
The media’s had its first look at Mary Trump’s book, but is there anything damaging in it? Leftists go after the once-woke musical “Hamilton.” Jim DeMint, author of “Saving America from Socialism,” discusses where the Republican Party is in the fight for our country. Moms April Pollock and Shelly Heller created Temp-N-Toss, a disposable forehead thermometer that has skyrocketed in popularity during the pandemic.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
